description:
Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at £4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

Glorify: Your Daily Christian App for Devotional and Prayer. Grow with God. Every day.

Over 20 million Christians have already enriched their faith journeys with Glorify. Join them! Download Glorify today. 

Start your quiet time with an inspiring quote, followed by a Bible passage and a devotional that ties everything together. Wrap up with an immersive Daily Walk with God, a virtual walk meditating on God’s Word.

Feeling busy? We get it. Glorify helps you connect with God in just 10 minutes, fitting into your daily routine.

Build a deeper connection with God every day through daily devotionals, guided Christian meditation, and prayer.

Plus, all the tools you need to strengthen your relationship with God:

• Grow with your faith community: 

Connect with friends, family, and church communities. Discuss devotionals, share prayer requests, and support each other.

• Sleep and Calming Meditations: 

Relax and focus on God with scripture-based meditations that draw you into a peaceful space.

• Transformational Christian Courses: 

Explore courses designed to deepen your understanding of the Bible and your faith.

• Powerful Declarations: 

Speak life over your circumstances with biblically-based declarations.

• Official Bible Translations:

 Access multiple Bible translations, including the King James Version (KJV).

• Bible Journal and Worship Music: 

Document your spiritual journey and enjoy your favorite worship music.

• Grow closer to God and connect with others in prayer. 

You may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through an In-App Purchase.

• Auto-renewable subscription

• $6.99 / month

• Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24    hours before the end of the current period.

• Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase

Terms & Conditions: https://glorify-app.com/terms-conditions/ 

Privacy Policy: https://glorify-app.com/privacy-policy/

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Voice translation was never so easy! Travel around the world and easily communicate in any country – Voice Translator will instantly pronounce translated phrases on-the-fly! Can’t read the menu items in a fancy foreign restaurant? Those days are history now with instant camera translation!

Communicate freely at the airport, hotel, gas station, supermarket or any other place. Read street signs in a foreign country, translate manuals of your overseas purchases or the text of any picture you already have in your phone. Just put your personal interpreter into a pocket and use it for your all translating needs!

Voice Translator is an essential learning tool for kids and adults – learn new phrases and listen to the correct pronunciation.

Start using Voice Translator now and forget about looking for the correct phrase in the dictionary – say any phrase and your interpreter will pronounce the translation out loud!

Features:
– Immediate translation of real-time conversations
– Use your camera for instant text translation
– Translate texts from your photos and pics
– Translate as you type in any of your favorite messaging apps
– Extended offline phrasebook
– Language detection for text-to-text mode
– 100+ languages working in speech-to-speech and text-to-text modes
– You can either speak or type to translate your text
– Smart text-to-text mode
– Speed up your text input with typing hints
– Convert text from languages with non-Latin alphabet
– Copy, paste and share translations in a single tap
– Intuitive dialogue conversation interface
– Speak the translated phrase out loud
– Control the speed of voice
– Male and female voices available
– Human-to-Pet and Pet-to-Human modes (for entertainment purposes only). Translate your pet’s meow or woof into your language.

Currently supported voice-to-voice languages:

UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES

• Subscriptions are billed weekly, monthly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.

MyFlixer is your ultimate destination for everything movies—whether you’re hunting for your next binge-worthy pick, catching up on the latest trailers, or chatting with an AI that knows films better than your best friend.

Why you’ll love it:

- Discover Your Next Favorite – Browse by genre, rating, or release year and uncover hidden gems tailored to your taste.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming blockbusters so you’re always first in line.

- Trailers in HD & Movie info – Watch crisp, high-definition trailers that bring the big-screen excitement straight to your device.

- Your Personal Watchlist – Save movies you want to see and organize them in one seamless place.

- Track & Rate – Keep a log of what you’ve watched, leave your ratings, and build your own movie diary.

- Deep Dive into Details – Explore cast lists, reviews, and in-depth movie info for the true film enthusiast.

- AI Movie Chatbot – Get personalized recommendations and movie conversations powered by smart AI—like chatting with a cinephile buddy who knows your taste.

With a sleek design and powerful features, this isn’t just another movie app—it’s your complete movie companion.

Data Source:

All movie and TV data, including images and descriptions, are provided courtesy of The Movie Database (TMDB).
This product uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDB

Disclaimer:

It is not affiliated with or endorsed by any third-party content providers or studios.
This app does not stream or host any movies or TV shows.
All trademarks and copyrights belong to their respective owners.

Hey, I'm Lenny - your Bible-based friend who's always got your back with wise words, scripture-inspired guidance, and a listening ear whenever you need it. Ever wished for a friend who truly understands your heart and offers heartfelt advice rooted deeply in your faith? That's exactly who I am, blending genuine companionship with spiritual depth, making your daily life brighter and full of faith.

Life can have its ups and downs, and sometimes you just need someone to talk to about what's on your mind - big or small. I'm always here for meaningful conversations, guiding you gently through life's challenges with comforting wisdom directly inspired by scriptures and the teachings of Jesus.

Here's why you'll love spending time with me:
- Real chats & genuine comfort: Feel free to talk openly about anything - your dreams, doubts, struggles, or joys. I'll respond thoughtfully, always backed by comforting verses and the wisdom of God's Word, helping you find peace and clarity.
- Daily boost of faith: whether it's morning devotionals or evening reflections, I provide personalized prayers and uplifting Bible wisdom tailored just for you, keeping your spirit strong and your connection to Jesus vibrant.
- Personalized spiritual growth: I meet you exactly where you are on your faith journey, whether you're seeking strength, forgiveness, reassurance, or deeper understanding. Our conversations will become stepping stones toward growing closer to God and enriching your spiritual life.
- Lift Your Burdens: got something weighing on your heart? I offer a private, safe space for sharing your worries, seeking forgiveness, and finding comfort - much like talking privately with a trusted buddy, easing your soul through faith-based guidance.
- Interactive and fun faith experiences: dive into engaging activities and reflective meditations inspired by biblical teachings. I make exploring scriptures and devotions enjoyable, interactive, and fulfilling.

I'm not just another app; I'm your loyal companion, AI assistant, and spiritual friend, bringing comfort, joy, and wisdom to your daily life. Whether you're just beginning to explore your faith or looking to deepen your spiritual connection, I'll walk beside you every step of the way.

Try Creed now and experience the warmth of a friend guided by faith. You'll quickly realize how wonderful it feels to have someone who truly understands your heart and helps you grow spiritually each day.

Terms of use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy policy: https://www.usecreed.com/privacy

description:
In today's era, having a good body is the most important wealth of a person, so we must always pay attention to our physical health.
Blood sugar tracker-AI health helps everyone record their blood sugar and form statistical data and summary. After measuring blood sugar in life, users can enter the measurement results into our application. Please rest assured that we will only use your results for statistics and will protect the privacy of users.

Having a good body is the premise of everything.
Features:
1. Support multiple languages to serve global users
2. Blood sugar data support entry
3. Popular science of blood sugar related knowledge
4. Health data privacy and security

Disclaimer
This application is designed to provide users with routine health services such as blood sugar data recording and blood sugar knowledge. It should be clear that all content provided by this application does not constitute any medical diagnosis, treatment plan or health guidance advice, nor can it replace the diagnosis, treatment and advice of professional doctors or other healthcare professionals. If you are outside this application, please be sure to consult a professional doctor and follow the doctor's arrangements before making any medical decisions.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Architecture Dictionary by Farlex gives you free, instant access to more than 28,000 architecture terms and 9,000 images, all from authoritative sources, including McGraw-Hill.

Whether you're an architect, architecture student, engineer, designer, or just interested in architecture, this free architecture dictionary app can help you find clear, in-depth definitions and images right on your iPhone or iPad. Search multiple architecture encyclopedias and dictionaries for entries on: 

Architects and prominent figures in the field
Architecture of different eras, regions, and religions 
Design elements
Movements
Construction terms
Photos, illustrations, and diagrams
+ much more…

FEATURES:

* Search 28,000+ architecture terms and definitions from top sources you won't find anywhere else.

* View 9,000+ architectural images, including photos, illustrations, and diagrams of significant structures and elements.

* Save unlimited bookmarks to quickly access the terms you view most.  

* Use native voice search to look up a word just by saying it. (With supported devices)

* See search suggestions as you type and always find what you're looking for.

* View your recent searches.

* Perform advanced searches, including "Starts with," "Ends with," "Contains," and "Wildcard."

* Adjust font size.

* Listen to 10,000+ audio pronunciations for both American and British speakers

* Share definitions via social networks, email, and text. (With supported devices)

User-friendly, comprehensive, and authoritative: Architecture Dictionary by Farlex is the perfect free architecture app for architects, architecture students, engineers, designers, builders, art historians, and anyone interested in learning more about architecture, engineering, and design. This is NOT a preview or a trial version, and there is no "locked" content. Open the app on your iPhone or iPad and immediately access all content — no subscriptions required!

How do we do it?

TheFreeDictionary.com - Farlex apps have been downloaded tens of millions times across multiple platforms, with top ratings after hundreds of thousands of reviews. We work with the best publishers to bring together trusted content in the most comprehensive, authoritative dictionary apps on the market. Our flagship app is The Free Dictionary (TFD), powered by TheFreeDictionary.com. Find our other apps by searching "Dictionary by Farlex" in the App Store.

"Pray Daily" is your invitation to a deeper, more meaningful relationship with the Divine. Immerse yourself in a spiritual haven, where every tap, every scroll, every interaction brings you one step closer to the heart of God. Designed for the devoted soul, this app seamlessly combines time-tested scriptures with modern functionalities to guide, inspire, and enlighten.

Deepen Your Connection Through Prayer
Harness the profound power of prayer. With "Pray Daily," every morning ushers in hope, and every night brings solace. Our extensive database of verses ensures that your conversations with God are always heartfelt and sincere, allowing you to express your most profound feelings, aspirations, and desires with ease.

Elevate Your Scripture Reading Experience
"Pray Daily" has been built to enhance your scripture reading. Revel in the divine teachings, customize your reading experience, and let the words of the Lord resonate. From adding notes to highlighting significant passages, and from listening to calming Bible audios during daily commutes to having His word guide you even without an internet connection, the scriptures have never been this accessible.

AI Priest - The Fusion of Faith & Technology
In moments of doubt, introspection, or simply seeking understanding, turn to our advanced AI Priest. This modern marvel, powered by cutting-edge technology and infused with biblical wisdom, stands ready to assist, advise, and guide you in all spiritual matters.

Challenge and Relax with Bible Trivia
Add a dose of fun to your spiritual journey. Dive into our extensive collection of Bible trivia, quizzes, and challenges. Perfect for both ardent Bible scholars and those seeking a relaxed yet enlightening activity. Every quiz brings a new opportunity to learn, reflect, and grow.

Structured Spiritual Growth
Guidance is paramount in one's journey of faith. Our selection of Bible plans is curated to cater to diverse needs. Be it deepening understanding, seeking emotional healing, or simply walking a path of enlightenment, "Pray Daily" has a plan tailored just for you.

A Global Church Experience
Our interactive Bible games not only provide moments of relaxation but also reward you with captivating views of sacred sanctuaries from across the globe. Each jigsaw puzzle piece you collect unlocks a new perspective, a new beacon of faith.

Chronicle Every Step with God
Your spiritual journey is precious. With "Pray Daily," every insight, every revelation, and every heartfelt prayer is preserved, letting you revisit and reflect upon these cherished moments anytime.

Key Features:

A rich, immersive prayer platform for conversations with God.

Welcome to the world of simplified crafting: YarnPal is the app that brings your knitting and crochet skills to life in no time. Simply snap a photo, follow step-by-step instructions, and create personalised projects—anytime, anywhere.

YarnPal is your daily companion for knitting and crochet, giving you easy access to tutorials, patterns, and design inspiration. Try it now with our free trial and unlock a world of stitches, motifs, and creative possibilities—perfect for both beginners and experienced makers!

What Can YarnPal Do?
1. Snap a Photo, Learn a Stitch
Seen a stitch you love? Take a photo, and YarnPal will tell you its name and show you how to do it. Picking up new stitches is quick and easy!
2. Step-by-Step Pattern Help
Stuck on a pattern? Upload it to YarnPal. The app will break it down for you and help you keep track of your place as you work through each row. You can even adjust the pace to suit your needs.
3. Creative AI Tools
Get Pattern Ideas: Lacking inspiration? Let YarnPal’s AI suggest new patterns for scarves, shawls, and other creative projects.
Fix Mistakes: Made an error? YarnPal can spot and help you fix it.
Understand Charts and Symbols: Struggling with pattern charts? YarnPal explains the symbols so you can follow along with confidence.
4. Ask the AI Coach
Have a question about knitting or crochet? Ask the AI Coach anything! From basic stitches to advanced techniques, get instant answers and helpful advice.
5. Personalise Your Projects
Want to make something unique? Adjust sizes, styles, and patterns to match your ideas. YarnPal helps you create truly one-of-a-kind pieces.

Who Is YarnPal For?
1. Beginners
New to knitting or crochet? YarnPal makes learning simple, with clear steps and helpful tips to get you started with confidence.
2. Hobbyists
Already enjoy knitting or crochet? Use YarnPal to try out new tools, tackle tricky patterns, and customise your projects. Take your craft to the next level!
3. Experts
Even for advanced crafters, YarnPal saves you time and sparks fresh ideas. Design better patterns, fix issues efficiently, and stay motivated.

Why Use YarnPal?
With YarnPal, crafting is:
Easy: Learn stitches and patterns stress-free.
Fun: Get creative and try something new.
Organised: Easily keep track of projects and progress.

Join the YarnPal Community
Connect with knitters and crocheters from around the world to share ideas, showcase your work, and get inspired. With YarnPal, you’ll never craft alone.

Start Your YarnPal Journey Today!
Download YarnPal now and see what you can create. Whether it’s your first simple scarf or an intricate piece of your own design, YarnPal will guide you every step of the way. Let’s make something amazing together!

Super fast search and navigation. NIV, NKJV, KJV, ESV, NLT, Amplified, The Message and more. Get explanation with free 15-day trial to commentaries, dictionaries and Strong's concordance. Sync all your data to eBible.com.

eBible App Helps You Engage the Bible More
* Beautifully rendered page-flip simulates real book experience
* Journal notes and search them by keywords
* Highlight an entire verse or on individual words, like a real book
* Layer highlights on top of another including underlining
* Fastest navigation - type 'R' and see all books starting with R.
* Reading plans and devotionals to help you stay engaged
* Sync to the cloud - access all your data on our website (http://ebible.com) and other devices
* Study tools - concordances, commentaries and dictionaries (in-app purchase)
* 40+ Bible translations including New International Version (NIV), New King James Version (NKJV), English Standard Version (ESV), New Living Translation (NLT), The Message (MSG), Amplified (AMP), New American Standard Bible (NASB), King James Version (KJV) and more

Now includes over 10,000 answers to questions on the Bible, God and Christianity. See the most commonly asked questions next to verses you're reading. Read answers from our community.  

Don't see what you need? Ask your question here on eBible and get help from real people!

What our users say:

“Best bible to read from. This is the most aesthetically pleasing bible to read from. Simple, smooth, and I like how you can scroll through a book and the titles of each section to find a story, event, or the account that you are looking for. Especially like the breakdown of Strong's number and definitions of each word in a verse which allows you to study the whole verse in one quick, convenient fatal sweep... and get cross references and Matthew Henry's take on it... all in one place! Awesome!” -- Seen003, Apr 9, 2012 

“Excellent Bible App!!!! - I have used a number of the Bible apps available...and find this new version to be my favorite! What I really like: closest look/feel to a paper Bible (the fonts and layout is the most realistic I've seen), when highlighting a verse or section you get not only a "copy" function, but direct access to the commentaries, references to the Strong's concordance, and cross-references that make this Bible a really viable study tool, as well! Also, the Bible versions are robust enough for almost all users, with downloadable versions...Bottom-line...this Bible App has, IMHO, moved into the forefront in this category! At the price...who can say "no" to at least trying it, if not making it the one you go to for Bible reading and study!?!?” -- MacTombo, Nov 29, 2011
